field_edited_text.value:
EstiMATED CoST OF BRIDGE AND APPROACHES 161

Point-Kent Island Site. The estimated total construction cost is herein
presented in Tables 77, 78, and 79, to the total of which has been added,
in Table 76, $60,000 for toll booths and administration building, which is
the same amount used for estimating the same facilities at the Sandy Point-
Kent Island Site, and $179,788 contingencies, which has been estimated to
be approximately 49, of the cost of the bridge substructure, as was done in
estimating contingencies for the Sandy Point-Kent Island Site.

Table 77 is the estimated cost of the bridge substructure and includes
estimated quantities and unit prices for the various items of construction
entering the complete substructure. Table 78 is the estimated cost of the
bridge superstructure and includes estimated quantities of different items
of structural steel and concrete filled floor at estimated unit prices.
